description:
Veet PURE legs and body cold wax strips contain a hypoallergenic wax formula** and provides long lasting smoothness in just 4 easy steps.

Veet hypoallergenic hair removal wax formula with PURE is dermatologically recommended by the Skin Health Alliance which involves a scientific review performed by a team of independent dermatologists (only applicable to wax strips). Formulated to minimise the number of ingredients required and the risk of allergic reactions. Veet Pure Legs and Body Hair Removal Cold Wax Strips removes the hairs from the root, for long lasting smoothness.

Refined formula* wax strips

Hypoallergenic wax formula**

Hair removal with long lasting smoothness

Suitable for sensitive skin
name: Veet Pure Cold Wax Strips Legs & Body 40 Pack
